casebody.data:
LASALLE BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION AS TRUSTEE FOR CERTIFICATE HOLDERS OF EMC MORTGAGE LOAN TRUST 2004-A MORTGAGE LOAN PASS THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2004-A
v.
Richard B. WHITMAN, Jr., Sandra M. Whitman Petition of: Sandra M. Whitman No. 349 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. November 28, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 28th day of November, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
